name: Iruxi Unarmed Cunning
summary: You make the most of your iruxi unarmed attacks.
description:
You make the most of your iruxi unarmed attacks. Whenever you score a critical hit with a claw or an unarmed attack you gained from a lizardfolk ancestry feat, you apply the unarmed attackâ€™s critical specialization effect.Traits

Lizardfolk: These reptilian humanoids, also known as iruxi, are extremely adaptable and patient.
